about_the_game:
In "Cryptic Route," you start as the protagonist driving through a dark night, surrounded by the ambiance of rain.

With no clear understanding of why, you find yourself in this situation.

Throughout the journey, only a shovel and a cellphone are left on the passenger seat, offering no clues about the unfolding events or the mission at hand.

As you progress along the road, the eerie combination of the dark night, the sound of rain, and the protagonist's own breathing immerse you into unsettling situations.

These atmospheric elements set the stage for significant choices that determine the outcome of your journey.

The game's multiple ending system ensures that every decision you make leads to consequences, branching out into various outcomes.

This game plunges you into the atmosphere of a dark night accompanied by the sound of rain, challenging you to decipher the secrets hidden within the forest alongside the protagonist amidst a palpable sense of suspense.

name: Cryptic Route Demo

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: Intel Pentium Dual-Core E2000 Series(1.6 GHz) or better
  • Memory: 200 MB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce 8600GT or better
  • DirectX: Version 9.0
  • Storage: 150 MB available space
  • Sound Card: DirectX-compatible sound card

short_description: "Cryptic Route" begins with the protagonist driving through a rainy night forest. Relying on navigation, each choice influences the outcome of the journey. The multiple ending system offers various results, immersing players into a tale of mystery and horror.
